  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Bon profit! Cadenes i xarxes tròfiques</string>
            <string language="en">Enjoy your meal! Food chains and networks.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genießen Sie Ihre Mahlzeit! 
Nahrungsmittelketten und -netze.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appréciez votre repas ! Chaînes 
alimentaires et réseaux.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprecíe sua refeição! Correntes e redes 
de alimento.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Goda il vostro pasto! Cicli alimentari e 
reti.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απολαύστε το γεύμα σας! Τροφικές αλυσίδες και 
δίκτυα.</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva d'ecologia amb tres apartats sobre les relacions entre els nivells tròfics. Conté glossari, una activitat d'autoavaluació sobre una xarxa tròfica (Avalua't) i exercicis d'elaboració de cadenes i xarxes tròfiques (Practica).</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on ecology in three sections showing the relationship between trophic levels. It includes a glossary, a self-assessment activity on a food network; and practice exercises on food chains and networks.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ecologia</string>
            <string language="en">ecology</string>
            <string language="es">ecología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cadena alimentària</string>
            <string language="en">food chain</string>
            <string language="es">cadena alimentaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">natural sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
Ökologie in drei Kapiteln, die das Verhältnis zwischen trophischen 
Stufen zeigen. Es schließt ein Glossar, eine Selbstbewertung 
Aktivität in einem Nahrungsmittelnetz ein; und Übungen auf 
Nahrungsmittelketten und -netzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
l'écologie dans trois sections montrant le rapport entre les niveaux 
trophiques. Il inclut un glossaire, une activité de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sur un réseau de nourriture ; et exercices 
pratiques sur les chaînes alimentaires et les réseaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no ecology em 
três seções que mostram o relacionamento entre níveis trophic. 
Inclui um glossário, uma atividade do self-assessment em uma 
rede do alimento; e exercícios de prática em correntes e em 
redes de alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) su ecologia 
in tre sezioni che mostrano il rapporto fra i livelli trofici. 
Include un glossario, un'attività di valutazione di se stesso 
su una rete dell'alimento; ed esercitazioni di pratica sui cicli
alimentari e sulle reti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στην 
οικολογία σε τρία τμήματα που εμφανίζουν τη σχέση μεταξύ των 
τροφικών επιπέδων. Περιλαμβάνει ένα γλωσσάρι, μια 
δραστηριότητα αυτοαξιολόγησης σε ένα δίκτυο τροφίμων  και 
ασκήσεις πρακτικής στις τροφικές αλυσίδες και τα δίκτυα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittelkette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürliche Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chaîne alimentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences normales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente de alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências naturais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ecologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ciclo alimentare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze naturali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τροφική αλυσίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
